questions.question: What platforms have you worked with for managing e-commerce websites?
questions.canonical_answer: I’ve worked with platforms like Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, and BigCommerce depending on the business size and customization needs.

questions.question: How do you increase online sales and conversion rates?
questions.canonical_answer: I optimize product pages, improve UX, run targeted ads, refine CTAs, use A/B testing, and implement email automation and retargeting.

questions.question: What metrics do you track to measure e-commerce performance?
questions.canonical_answer: I track conversion rate, CAC, AOV, cart abandonment rate, traffic sources, CLV, and revenue metrics to measure performance.

questions.question: How do you handle SEO for an online store?
questions.canonical_answer: I optimize product descriptions, titles, URLs, improve site speed, add structured data, and build internal linking and relevant content.

questions.question: How do you manage digital advertising campaigns?
questions.canonical_answer: I set goals, segment audiences, design creatives, run ads on platforms like Google and Meta, monitor ROAS, and optimize continuously.

questions.question: How do you handle customer feedback and complaints online?
questions.canonical_answer: I respond quickly, address issues politely, offer solutions or refunds, track recurring problems, and use feedback to improve processes.

questions.question: Describe a time you improved an e-commerce site’s performance or sales
questions.canonical_answer: I improved sales by optimizing product pages, speeding up the site, refining ad targeting, and improving checkout flow to reduce drop-offs.
